remarks: Given an atom, there exists another.  (Contributed by NM, 25-Apr-2015.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:

dvh4dimat.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.

dvh2dimat.p $e |- ( ph -> P e. A ) $.
dvh2dimatN $p |- ( ph -> E. s e. A s =/= P ) $.
